biolockj.util.paths

Class SimpleDockerMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.util.paths.BasicDockerMapper
      • biolockj.util.paths.SimpleDockerMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DockerMountMapper, PathMapper

    public class SimpleDockerMapper
extends BasicDockerMapper
    Introduced with BioLockJ v1.3.18. Unlike the CommonDockerMapper made at the same time, this Mapper does not make any special considerations for ":". This simplification should be completely fine on unix-like systems.
    Author:
    Ivory Blakley

      • version

        public String version()
        Description copied from interface: DockerMountMapper
        Changes to a mapper class should be accompanied by a increment in version. The is a string and open form, but using the major.minor.patch semantic versioning is recommended.
        Returns:

        Description copied from class: BasicDockerMapper
